kese wethath, niwasa ha idikirim amathyawarayage amathyanshayata ayath wishayapathayakata amathi patali champika kabinat mandalayata yojana idiripath kirimath, niwasa idikirime maha parimana wyapruthiyakata wirodhayakin thorawama kabinat anumathiya himi wimath sajith premadasa ha agamathiwaraya athara athi wirasakayehi prathipalayak wiya haki bawa deshapalana aaranchimarga heli karayi.
